div.p: ( a– c) Confocal microphotographs of live HeLa cells, L02 cells, and macrophage cells without NM-CQD incubation, respectively. ( d– f) Confocal micro-photographs of live HeLa cells, L02 cells, and macrophage cells incubated with 40 µL of NM-CQDs at 37 °C for 3 h, respectively. Detection of NM-CQD fluorescence in cells was achieved using a 405-nm laser as an excitation source.
